prompts: Create a bird Pokemon that has striking brown feathers and sharp red accents.
Imagine a flying-type Pokemon that embodies speed and agility with long wings.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a large bird of prey, known for its fierce personality.
Show me a Pokemon with a powerful beak and dominant presence in the sky.
Generate a majestic bird Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions and open fields.
Give me a Pokemon that can soar through the skies effortlessly with its strong wings.
Make a Pokemon that is both a Normal and Flying type, showcasing a dynamic pose.
